description:
## Problem

No way to search issues by title/description text. The reviewer noted agents do not always think to use bw list --json | jq.

## bd alignment

bd has a separate bd search command with 20+ filter flags, bd query with boolean query language, and bd find-duplicates with AI search. That rabbit hole is deep. For bw, --grep on bw list covers the reviewer ask simply. Agents can still use bw list --json | jq for complex cases.

## Implementation

### Data model (internal/issue/issue.go)
- Add Grep string to Filter struct
- In Store.List, after existing filter checks: case-insensitive substring match on Title + Description. Use strings.Contains(strings.ToLower(...), strings.ToLower(filter.Grep))

### CLI (cmd/bw/list.go)
- Add Grep string to ListArgs
- Parse --grep / -g flag, pass to filter.Grep

### Command registration (cmd/bw/command.go)
- Add {Long: '--grep', Short: '-g', Value: 'TEXT', Help: 'Search title and description'} to list flags

## Acceptance criteria

- [ ] bw list --grep 'login' returns only issues with 'login' in title or description
- [ ] Search is case-insensitive ('Login' matches 'login')
- [ ] Combines with other filters (e.g. bw list --grep 'auth' --status open)
- [ ] bw list --grep 'nonexistent' returns 'no issues found'
- [ ] bw list --grep 'text' --json outputs filtered JSON
- [ ] bw list --help shows --grep / -g flag

## Test requirements

- Unit test for Store.List with Grep filter matching title
- Unit test for Store.List with Grep filter matching description
- Unit test for case-insensitive matching
- Unit test for Grep combined with Status filter
- Unit test for no matches
- Existing tests pass (go test ./...)
title: Add --grep flag to bw list
